Name: In relation to recycling
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to recycling.
BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
Section 1. Section 16-308 of title 16 of the administrative code of the city of New York is hereby amended by adding a new subdivision g to read as follows:
g. The department shall provide to any resident of the city, upon request and without charge, a bin appropriate for use by such resident to compost yard waste.
	Â§2. This local law shall take effect immediately upon its enactment into law.
